scripts.db:summary: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c "SELECT 'Patients' AS type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM app.patient UNION ALL SELECT 'Doctors', COUNT(*) FROM app.doctor UNION ALL SELECT 'Admins', COUNT(*) FROM app.admin UNION ALL SELECT 'Audit Events', COUNT(*) FROM security.events_log;"
scripts.db:connect: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && echo Database reset! Run npm run db:start to restart
scripts.db:backup: docker compose exec postgres pg_dump -U jondb_admin jon_database_dev > database/backups/backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.sql:run: docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.schema:create: type database\project\01_core_schema.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.monitoring:enable: type database\project\02_monitoring_triggers.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.schema:full: npm run schema:create && npm run monitoring:enable
scripts.schema:drop: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c "DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS app CASCADE; CREATE SCHEMA app;"
scripts.schema:rebuild: npm run schema:drop && npm run schema:create
scripts.seeds:reference: type database\seeds\00_reference_data.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:patients: type database\seeds\01_patients_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:doctors: type database\seeds\02_doctors_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:admins: type database\seeds\03_admins_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:prescriptions: type database\seeds\04_prescriptions_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:prescription-versions: type database\seeds\05_prescription_versions_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:medication-schedules: type database\seeds\06_medication_schedules_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:patient-symptoms: type database\seeds\07_patient_symptoms_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:medication-logs: type database\seeds\08_medication_logs_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:reminders: type database\seeds\09_reminders_seed.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.seeds:run: npm run seeds:reference && npm run seeds:patients && npm run seeds:doctors && npm run seeds:admins && npm run seeds:prescriptions && npm run seeds:prescription-versions && npm run seeds:medication-schedules && npm run seeds:patient-symptoms && npm run seeds:medication-logs && npm run seeds:reminders
scripts.queries:validate: type database\queries\00_validation_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:validate:verbose: type database\queries\00_validation_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.queries:test: type database\queries\test_queries.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:doctor: type database\queries\01_doctor_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d  jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:patient: type database\queries\02_patient_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:sideEffects: type database\queries\03_sideEffect_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:admin: type database\queries\04_admin_query.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.queries:run: npm run queries:validate && npm run queries:test
scripts.perf:baseline: type database\performance\01_baseline_benchmark.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.perf:optimize: type database\performance\02_advanced_indexes.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.perf:after: type database\performance\03_after_benchmark.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.perf:report: type database\performance\04_comparison_report.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -a -e
scripts.perf:demo: type database\performance\05_demonstration.sql | docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev
scripts.migrate:up: for file in database/migrations/*.sql; do type "$file" | npm run sql:run; done
scripts.project:fresh: npm run db:reset && npm run db:start && timeout /t 30 && npm run schema:full && npm run seeds:run
scripts.project:full: npm run db:reset && npm run db:start && timeout /t 30 && npm run schema:create && npm run monitoring:enable && npm run seeds:run && npm run ai:install && npm run analytics:install && npm run ai:generate
scripts.analytics:install: docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -f /database/analytics/00_install_all.sql
scripts.analytics:pipeline: docker compose exec -T postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -f /database/analytics/08_analytics_report.sql
scripts.analytics:test: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) FROM analytics.v_patient_risk_assessment;'
scripts.analytics:verify: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c "SELECT schemaname, viewname FROM pg_views WHERE schemaname = 'analytics' ORDER BY viewname;"
scripts.analytics:refresh: docker compose exec postgres psql -U jondb_admin -d jon_database_dev -c 'SELECT analytics.refresh_dashboard_views();'
